Paul Millsap

Paul Millsap ▪ Instagram: paulmillsap4

(The Anchorman)

Position: Power Forward and Center ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 257lb (201cm, 116kg)

Born: February 10, 1985 in Monroe, Louisiana us

Relatives: Brothers Elijah Millsap, John Millsap

College: Louisiana Tech

High School: Grambling in Grambling, Louisiana

Recruiting Rank: 2003 (66)

Draft: Utah Jazz, 2nd round (17th pick, 47th overall), 2006 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 1, 2006

Career Length: 16 years

  • 2006-07 All-Rookie
  • 2015-16 All-Defensive

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Paul Millsap?

Paul Millsap is 40 years old.

Where was Paul Millsap born?

Paul Millsap was born in Monroe, Louisiana.

When was Paul Millsap born?

Paul Millsap was born on February 10, 1985.

How tall is Paul Millsap?

Paul Millsap is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Paul Millsap weigh when playing?

Paul Millsap weighed 257 lbs (116 kg) when playing.

Is Paul Millsap in the Hall of Fame?

Paul Millsap is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Paul Millsap drafted?

Paul Millsap was drafted by Utah Jazz, 2nd round (17th pick, 47th overall), 2006 NBA Draft.

What position did Paul Millsap play?

Power Forward and Center.

When did Paul Millsap retire?

Paul Millsap last played in 2022.

What is Paul Millsap's net worth?

Paul Millsap made at least $195,823,761 playing professional basketball.

How much did Paul Millsap make?

Paul Millsap made $31,269,231 in 2018.

What did Paul Millsap average?

Paul Millsap averaged 13.4 points, 7.1 rebounds, and 2.2 assists per game.

How many rings does Paul Millsap have?

Paul Millsap won 0 championships.

What is Paul Millsap's Twitter account?

Paul Millsap is on Twitter at Paulmillsap4.

What is Paul Millsap's Instagram account?

Paul Millsap is on Instagram at paulmillsap4.

What schools did Paul Millsap attend?

Paul Millsap attended Grambling in Grambling, Louisiana and Louisiana Tech.

What are Paul Millsap's nicknames?

The Anchorman is a nickname for Paul Millsap.
